feed.title: Dozzle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.9.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Enables container filter to be configured at multiple places  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3455 (d3e57)
  • Adds small loader while logging in  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3457 (5a5a0)
  • Allows filters to be set at user level  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3456 (d3128). See documentation.

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes flushing race bug where container events were not show on page  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3445 (84003)
  • Hides stats when columns are too narrow.  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3452 (289fc)
  • Fixes redirect when container was created before it was stopped  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3446 (668a0)
  • deps:
  • Update dependency daisyui to ^4.12.20  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3443 (eefa3)
  • Update module golang.org/x/crypto to v0.31.0 [security]  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3450 (20813)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3453 (39be1)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3454 (a62ce)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.9.1
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Deploys to ghcr  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3487 (98445)
  • Supports downloading a group of containers in a zip file  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3490 (d93ef)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes missed cases to validate user scope when downloading, streaming and actions  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3460 (bd0a8)
  • Fixes spacing on mobile  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3466 (4fa04)
  • Handles swarm mode menu on page load  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3470 (d34cf)
  • Uses correct i18n locale for grouped containers  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3469 (e5c1f)
  • Fixes stats hidden on mobile  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3474 (1a696)
  • Fixes log levels not being parsed correctly and supports short levels like dbg  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3491 (9cff8)
  • deps:
  • Update module github.com/go-chi/chi/v5 to v5.2.0  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3462 (6479b)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3463 (3adf5)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3468 (fc2a2)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3475 (0d515)
  • Update dependency entities to v6  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3476 (a98b1)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3480 (91d63)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3481 (4b19d)
  • Update dependency vue-i18n to v11  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3482 (52de7)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3484 (af0a8)
  • Update dependency @fontsource-variable/playfair-display to ^5.1.1  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3486 (7ec05)
  • Update dependency @intlify/unplugin-vue-i18n to ^6.0.3  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3488 (471cc)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.10.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds toggle on menu to show and hide all containers  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3493 (08e5d)
  • Enable merging logs for all containers in a host  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3492 (cc76c)
  • Improves navigation by implementing horizontal scrolling cards  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3498 (291d4)
  • Handles container exits better and uses the real time when container has exited  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3504 (46fb0)
  • Adds a new drop down to jump to same name containers  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3510 (917c8)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Shows container and host name correctly for events.  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3494 (65ef1)
  • Fixes levels not matching the new set  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3495 (95181)
  • Fixes mobile menu animation and flex  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3500 (7f12f)
  • Updates da and es  -  by @amir20 (8c6c6)
  • Fixes redirect for very old containers and removes the notification if cancelled  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3506 (e9910)
  • Fixes spacing on homepage  -  by @amir20 (66cc3)
  • Fixes timestamps for finished containers in agent  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3509 (756b2)
  • Removes empty containers  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3511 (a1a90)
  • Fixes broken menu on iphone  -  by @amir20 (f8e7d)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3499 (0f907)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3507 (1b829)
  • docs:
  • Fixes documentation wrong port  -  by @amir20 (dae28)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.10.1
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Handle log levels with double quotes  -  by @JamesGit1 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3519 (5c33f)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes case for FINISHED  -  by @amir20 (d79c5)
  • Fixes grouping not working with unknown levels  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3520 (5d574)
  • deps: Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3521 (90459)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.10.2
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes hostname feature for swarm mode  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3535 (5b822)
  • Fixes broken host page on initial page load  -  by @amir20 (11e12)
  • Fixes tests  -  by @amir20 (58d68)
  • Fixes unclickable items in search  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3540 (d455c)
  • deps:
  • Update dependency unplugin-icons to v22  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3528 (a389c)
  • Update dependency unplugin-auto-import to v19  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3527 (b29e7)
  • Update dependency unplugin-vue-components to v28  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3529 (37ecc)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3532 (57664)
  • Update all non-major dependencies to ^12.4.0  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3534 (0f1a9)
  • docs:
  • Fixes volume on authentication page  -  by @amir20 (35fd4)
  • lang:
  • Adds more locales  -  by @amir20 (3cb74)
    View changes on GitHub
